# KML Writter

GitLab

# Introduction

KML writing javascript librari

# Dependences

# Installation

$ npm i kmlwriter

# Functions

# Create a KML

kmlWriter.startKml()

# Read KML

Read an existing KML file:

kmlWriter.readFile('path/to/file')

# Start a kml

Generate a new KML file:

kmlWriter.startKml()

# Add a placemark

kmlWriter.addPlaceMark(int Id, string Name, int StyleID,  longitud, latitude, range)

# Generate KML file

kmlWriter.writeFile('path/to/file')
